FAQ's

FAQs

Frequently Asked Question

Frequently Asked Questions about Our Private Security Services and Future Mobile Application

What services does your private security agency offer?

Our private security agency offers a comprehensive range of security services to meet all your needs. We provide the option to rent individual qualified security agents, whom you can hire for blocks of 4 hours or more to fulfill your specific requirements. Whether it’s for a day, an evening, or an extended period, our team of experienced security agents is at your disposal. Our services include surveillance, access control, patrol, event security, and much more. Whatever the duration of your security needs, we are here to support you and ensure your peace of mind.

How can I benefit from your private security services?

Once our mobile application is available, you can easily benefit from our services by downloading it on your smartphone. Once installed, you will be able to request our on-demand security services wherever you are. However, for the time being, please fill out the service request form available in the ‘Contact Us’ section of our website to make your request. We will process your request promptly and provide you with the necessary information to avail yourself of our security services.

How will your mobile application work?

Our forthcoming mobile application will be designed to be user-friendly and easy to use. After creating an account, you will be able to select the required security service, provide details about your request, and proceed with payment. One of our security agents will then be assigned to your request, and you will have the option to chat with them to discuss your security needs. Our security agent will guide you and address any questions throughout the service delivery. While waiting for the launch of our mobile application, please use the service request form available in the ‘Contact Us’ section of our website.

How can I be sure of the reliability of your security agents?

The reliability of our security agents is our top priority. All our agents undergo a thorough selection process and hold security agent permits issued by the Quebec Private Security Bureau. Before obtaining the permit, the Bureau conducts extensive background checks. Therefore, you can be assured that our security agents are qualified and trustworthy professionals.Moreover, at the end of the service delivery, we invite you to complete a satisfaction and feedback questionnaire to evaluate the performance of the assigned agent. Your feedback is important to us, and we take appropriate administrative measures in case of non-compliance with our service quality requirements. We strive to maintain a high level of quality and meet your expectations.You can have full confidence in our highly qualified team of professionals who are committed to ensuring your safety and peace of mind.

What payment methods are accepted for security services?

We accept various payment methods for our security services, including credit cards and secure online payments. The mobile application will allow you to easily select the payment method that suits you best.

How can I contact your private security agency for additional questions?

For any additional questions or assistance, please fill out the form available in the ‘Contact Us’ section of our website. You can also use the provided contact details on our website and social media platforms to reach us directly. Our customer support team will be pleased to assist you and respond to your inquiries promptly. We are here to provide you with quality customer service and effective support. Please feel free to contact us for any requests or concerns; we are at your disposal.

What is your cancellation policy?

Free cancellation up to 24 hours before the scheduled service time. 50% refund for any cancellation made less than 24 hours before the scheduled service time. No refund for cancellations made within 4 hours of the scheduled service time. We appreciate your understanding of these deadlines, necessary for optimal resource management.

Client

Trusted by world's companies.

GET OUR EXCLUSIVE SECURITY PLUS MEMBERSHIP

As a privileged member, enjoy remote camera surveillance from our surveillance center 24/7, 365 days a year. This package is ideal for businesses, residential public spaces, as well as unoccupied residences, whether for a short or long period. In addition to this continuous surveillance, take advantage of preferential rates on all our security services. Join us today to discover the combined benefits of remote surveillance and exceptional security solutions offered by Selest. Your peace of mind is our priority.

Contact Us

We offer comprehensive security services while taking into account your requirements. Reach out to us for further details.
